name: Seen Being Seen
description:
Controls:
Use Arrow Keys to move around.

Description:
Stay within the Vision Cones of others.
Make friends.

The game was an experiment in giving abstract characters personality through behaviour changes and level design. 

Credits:
Sylph - Programming
Munro - Design, Audio

(Made for the Weekly Game Jam 168: Alternate Perspectives).

There may be slowdown towards the end of the game. If so, please comment and let us know. (Not sure if it's a local issue or a problem with the game itself, and might require a re-upload.)
